name: songs and flowers
description:
This is just a demo for a game where you play as a weird friend character. 

These are the love interests.

There are only 6 scenes per route left to be written but I needed to ask Bensound if this project could be pay what you can and I felt bad if I didn't send a copy to show what the music was being used for.

All of the music comes from Bensound.com.
